main.name: Vineet Kumar
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Innovative && Freelancer by Night
main.bio: My name is Vineet, I Love coding because with just a few lines of code I can turn my ideas into reality, which potentially can impact the world and shape the future.
main.bio1: I am currently studying at the Indian Institute Of Information Technology, Lucknow in India for my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: A person like you always stands behind the team in good as well as the hard times. You helped us in reaching our target work, we are fortunate to have you on our team. You and your work always stood by the expectations and has a meaningful contribution.
Vineet is an excellent team worker. We have worked in same team for HackGujarat competition. He not only has great dedication for his work but also motivate and help others.
